TEXT.TITLE: ROCKEFELLER CENTER PROPERTIES <RCP> UPS PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Rockefeller Center Properties Inc said it raised its quarterly dividend to 45 cts from 44 cts a share. The dividend is payable April 27 to shareholders of record April 7. Reuter
